description: Provides information on a specific data ingestion job such as creation time, dataset ARN, and status.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: Indicates the job ID of the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: DatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset being used in the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: IngestionInputConfiguration
nested_items.description: Specifies the S3 location configuration for the data input for the data ingestion job.

nested_items.name: S3InputConfiguration
nested_items.description: The location information for the S3 bucket used for input data for the data ingestion.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket used for the input data for the data ingestion.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for the S3 location being used for the input data for the data ingestion.

nested_items.name: KeyPattern
nested_items.description: The pattern for matching the Amazon S3 files that will be used for ingestion. If the schema was created previously without any KeyPattern, then the default KeyPattern {prefix}/{component_name}/* is used to download files from Amazon S3 according to the schema. This field is required when ingestion is being done for the first time.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role with permission to access the data source being ingested.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the data ingestion job was created.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of the DataIngestionJob operation.

nested_items.name: FailedReason
nested_items.description: Specifies the reason for failure when a data ingestion job has failed.

nested_items.name: DataQualitySummary
nested_items.description: Gives statistics about a completed ingestion job. These statistics primarily relate to quantifying incorrect data such as MissingCompleteSensorData, MissingSensorData, UnsupportedDateFormats, InsufficientSensorData, and DuplicateTimeStamps.

nested_items.name: InsufficientSensorData
nested_items.description: Parameter that gives information about insufficient data for sensors in the dataset. This includes information about those sensors that have complete data missing and those with a short date range.

nested_items.name: MissingCompleteSensorData
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes the total number of sensors that have data completely missing for it.

nested_items.name: AffectedSensorCount
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of sensors that have data missing completely.

nested_items.name: SensorsWithShortDateRange
nested_items.description: Parameter that describes the total number of sensors that have a short date range of less than 14 days of data overall.

nested_items.name: AffectedSensorCount
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of sensors that have less than 14 days of data.

nested_items.name: MissingSensorData
nested_items.description: Parameter that gives information about data that is missing over all the sensors in the input data.

nested_items.name: AffectedSensorCount
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of sensors that have atleast some data missing.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfMissingValues
nested_items.description: Indicates the total number of missing values across all the sensors.

nested_items.name: InvalidSensorData
nested_items.description: Parameter that gives information about data that is invalid over all the sensors in the input data.

nested_items.name: AffectedSensorCount
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of sensors that have at least some invalid values.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfInvalidValues
nested_items.description: Indicates the total number of invalid values across all the sensors.

nested_items.name: UnsupportedTimestamps
nested_items.description: Parameter that gives information about unsupported timestamps in the input data.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfUnsupportedTimestamps
nested_items.description: Indicates the total number of unsupported timestamps across the ingested data.

nested_items.name: DuplicateTimestamps
nested_items.description: Parameter that gives information about duplicate timestamps in the input data.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfDuplicateTimestamps
nested_items.description: Indicates the total number of duplicate timestamps.

nested_items.name: IngestedFilesSummary
nested_items.description: Gives statistics about how many files have been ingested, and which files have not been ingested, for a particular ingestion job.

nested_items.name: TotalNumberOfFiles
nested_items.description: Indicates the total number of files that were submitted for ingestion.

nested_items.name: IngestedNumberOfFiles
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of files that were successfully ingested.

nested_items.name: DiscardedFiles
nested_items.description: Indicates the number of files that were discarded. A file could be discarded because its format is invalid (for example, a jpg or pdf) or not readable.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the specific S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS key) key being used to encrypt the S3 object. Without this key, data in the bucket is not accessible.

nested_items.name: StatusDetail
nested_items.description: Provides details about status of the ingestion job that is currently in progress.

nested_items.name: IngestedDataSize
nested_items.description: Indicates the size of the ingested dataset.

nested_items.name: DataStartTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the earliest timestamp corresponding to data that was successfully ingested during this specific ingestion job.

nested_items.name: DataEndTime
nested_items.description: Indicates the latest timestamp corresponding to data that was successfully ingested during this specific ingestion job.

nested_items.name: SourceDatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the source dataset from which the data used for the data ingestion job was imported from.
